page.title: 19Chatteris - Fun Run
page.content:
Wednesday 26th June was quite an exciting day for some people. There was to be a Mini Fun Run around the town. Among the people entering was Cannon David Towers, changing from robes to running shorts.
They started from Chatteris Football Club in West Street, near the bypass. They ran right around the town and back to the field where they did as many laps as they could. The winner was Jonny Allen who completed it in about fifteen minutes. One runner, whose name was Dave Mills, had an unfortunate encounter with a BMX cycle. He continued for a while but had to drop out.
Young and not so young people entered and thoroughly enjoyed themselves working up quite a sweat.
